basics.name: Wonseo Choi
basics.label: AI Data Engineer
basics.summary: LAZY Developer & Striving for Beautiful Equation

work.name: Big Data Scientist/Engineer
highlights: Re-architected an automated analysis system from R to Python (Polars), optimizing data processing speed and system stability.
Established an end-to-end MLOps pipeline for auto-tuning systems to automate model deployment and ensure production quality.
Developed and deployed ML-based yield prediction models, leveraging big data to enhance manufacturing efficiency.
Optimized large-scale data processing workflows using R and Python to identify and mitigate yield loss factors.

work.position: Catholic Univ. of Korea Yeouido ST.Mary’s Hospital
work.name: Research Intern
highlights: Developed an automated AI system to extract test results from image-based sheets using Big Data techniques.
Conducted experiments and research on domain adaptation using Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), with a focus on 3D segmentation tasks for orbital tumor delineation.

work.name: Intern
highlights: Developed an automated AI system for heart rate calculation through biomedical image processing, analyzing size variations in sequential heart images.
Enhanced cell tracking performance by leveraging Explainable AI (XAI) techniques to analyze and optimize individual U-Net layers with respect to localization performance.
